website_summaries.verdict: An eco-friendly ottoman that manages to stand out from the crowd with its down-to-earth rustic appeal.
pros: White cedar construction is exceptionally hardy with natural insect and weather-resistant properties
Made in the USA and crafted from renewable resources
Simple design can be used as is or customized by staining, painting, or adding a cushion
cons: Wood may require some maintenance every once in a while

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty foot stool. Shipped securely, no damage. Easy to assemble. I stained all parts before assembly. Used a water based stain/sealant. All cedar except 3 2x5's which appear to be pine. See my review on chairs from same company.
customer_reviews.author: sideliner

customer_reviews.title: Instructions were easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and well packaged. Instructions were easy to follow, and I put these together (ordered two) in about 20-30 min. I am in no way a handy woman, and I had no issues. There are male/female pieces that you join together so a rubber mallot is helpful. I didn't have one on hand, so I just folded some cardboard from the box they came in, and used that as a cushion /barrier between the Cedar and my hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I was attracted to this Ottoman because I thought it was cute. I'm glad I bought it! It is a very functional piece of furniture to have on my patio. It's easy to move around for sitting low to work on things and nice to prop your feet up on as it was designed for. It also makes a nice little seat on the patio for my grandchildren. The assembly was quick and easy. I did not feel the need to put the screws in, as the dowels fit tightly together and do not slip.
customer_reviews.author: Waterspice

customer_reviews.title: I'm fine with the top being a different white wood because ...
customer_reviews.text: Went together perfectly. I did quite a bit of sanding and finished it with wood oil (Watco). I realize that I could have gone with the natural look, but since the legs and supports are cedar and the top pine or doug fir that they would weather differently. I'm fine with the top being a different white wood because it's harder than the cedar and will probably wear better. Time will tell. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bird Dog

customer_reviews.title: strongly built
customer_reviews.text: Husband put it together and was amazed at how well built it is. There are a few vertical cracks in the wood but I think that's natural. I get really nostalgic thinking about this kind of furniture at a cottage when my husband and I dated long ago.
customer_reviews.author: W. L SPAKOWSKI

customer_reviews.title: Foot pleasure
customer_reviews.text: Perfect foot height , wide, sturdy , nice looking , matches the rocking chair I purchased
customer_reviews.author: penny c.

customer_reviews.title: Using for Outdoor seating
customer_reviews.text: I love this company, I am using this as short stools, bought 2, I had bought one of these several years ago as a TV stand to hold my 55". easy to put together and you can stain, paint or leave natural. Worth every Penny.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Solid Rustic Style
customer_reviews.text: It takes just a few minutes to assemble & is very sturdy & nice looking. It's obviously an ottoman but it's also wide & solid enough to sit on, and though bit lower than a side table, it could work as one in a pinch. Very practical!
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: There is a matching swingset
customer_reviews.text: This little stool is well-made comes with all of the brackets and bolts and screws that you need to put it together. It goes together quickly. It also matches a swingset. In addition I would suggest that you give it at least two coats of a good varnish to help preserve it.
customer_reviews.author: ParrotHeadWNY

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stool, heavy duty, wish I could afford the chairs to match. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: L. L. McCollom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality and extremely sturdy. They are also very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Kimbell

customer_reviews.title: should have gotten two!  (and will)
customer_reviews.text: really cute. ample size. charming. non-intrusive. kind of settles into whatever space and use is good at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Judith L Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This is a high quality product! It was easy to assemble and I was able to stain it to match my other outdoor furniture with no problem! I was so pleased that I ordered a second one for my deck! Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Marsene

customer_reviews.title: Good size. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Good size. Easy to assemble. Smells great. Make sure you have a drill, a #2 Phillips driving bit, a rubber mallet or a wood block and a hammer to assemble this item.
customer_reviews.author: Megan H. Shihady

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I use this at the cabin. Put it right by the door so that folks can sit down to put on or take off their dirty shoes. It is basic, but fits the décor and seems sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: kbfambuyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stand.
customer_reviews.text: Stained it walnut and placed my Henry checkerboard box on it. Now waiting for a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to my garden furniture
customer_reviews.text: I already have several pieces from Lakeland Mills. These pieces enhance the natural feeling in my garden and look great year after year. My original furniture from them was purchased 18 years ago! Still functional and beautiful as ever!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Rettke

customer_reviews.title: Simply Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are very well built and very easy to assemble. Everything fit together like it was suppose to but the top boards appear to made from pine instead of white cedar and I didn't see that in the listing.
customer_reviews.author: Thunter40

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased these for foot rests for our Adirondack chairs but also as extra seating as needed. I put a cushion that matched the chairs on them and they look great! Well made and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: These look beautiful on our porch with their matching rocking chairs
customer_reviews.text: These look beautiful on our porch with their matching rocking chairs. So relaxing to have our feet up while on our chairs. They're so beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Jass28

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love all my Lakeland Mills Cedar log furniture. Same quality and rusticly handsome
customer_reviews.author: Bekka

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: product excellent and design happy i order the right ottoman for me
customer_reviews.author: antonio robles

customer_reviews.title: Lakeland Mills cedar log ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty. Easy assembly. Go great with the 2 rockers and end table
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: I have several of these outdoor furniture items and I'm very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Lakeland Mills products are quality furniture products. I have several of these outdoor furniture items and I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Attractive for the appropriate scenario. Unfinished so I could match the other furniture in room.
customer_reviews.author: LSH

customer_reviews.title: They love them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few of these for shelter to keep wild cottontails safe in the back yard. They love them!
customer_reviews.author: bunnygal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and goes great with the rocking chair I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: choochoo

customer_reviews.title: fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I put this next to my bed so my old cat can get on the bed but I have I long one outside my front door. This "ottoman" is fabulous. It will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: A. Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rustic furniture for our camp
customer_reviews.text: Perfect rustic furniture for our camp. Went together easily and is sturdy enough to use as extra seating. Finished it with 3-coats of spar varnish, looks terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lewandowski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this. We use it as a bench to sit on, a table and an ottoman.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Great foot stool
customer_reviews.text: The foot stool is solid, easy to assemble and very attractive in combination with the other pieces. I water sealed it to preserve the coloring of the cedar and to slow the aging process. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Bush

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and I gave it a finish. It is now very shiny and has some color to it. I am using these as a "bench" type. we use these to sit on with the pads added on top, they look great in my Lake Taheo chalet..
customer_reviews.author: Miss California  mom of US Soldier

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the piece. But one leg was shorter. So it wobbles.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Wingfield

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really love every piece in this set - very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Connie L. Grier

customer_reviews.title: Solid / Versatile / US made / Light sand and shellac or stain and varnish
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I hand sanded lighty a bit and put a clear shellac and it sits out side in all climates (under porch) and is holding up perfectly. Note the top planks are pine and the rest is cedar. Color wise it works. Sturdy - could prob support 300 + lbs. Ma tches the chair by same company. A cushion on this is bonzer for sitting and kicking your dogs up. Assembly required. Drill driver and a set of bits are your friends.
customer_reviews.author: DLH

customer_reviews.title: Love the white cedar pieces!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the white cedar pieces!! Have a set of table, chairs, lounge chairs and now this little guy..........I use it as a side table or a foot rest!!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Cedar outdoor furniture
customer_reviews.text: We love this furniture for our pergola. it is sturdy and quite attractive. We would recommend it to anyone looking for outdoor weather safe furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Anne E.

product_meta.title: Lakeland Mills Cedar Log Ottoman, Natural
product_meta.description: Lakeland mills cedar log ottoman is a perfect match for the cedar log lounge chair allowing you to really kick your shoes off and put your feet up.
feature_bullets: Made of insect and weather resistant white cedar
Made from a renewable resource and byproduct of the log home industry

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars51 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
